channel.title: PK anywhere
channel.description:
So have any of you guys ever played a private server where it uses the regular runescape world but pking is possible anywhere?(like the pvp worlds on osrs) I have played a few like that and would like to include it in the 317 server I am working on. I was wondering how hard/if there is a tutorial on how to implement this into your server.
I hope this was clear to understand and any help is highly appreciated.

item.title: PK anywhere
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

That’s saying the client is null and it’s dc’ing them. I still don’t see how that’s related to the inWild boolean.

Check your initialize method which should be found in the Client.java
See if it has anything related to checking if the player is in the wild or not.

Read full topic

item.title: PK anywhere
item.dc:creator: @monkof999 monkof999
item.description:
@monkof999 wrote:

This is what I edited: http://postimg.org/image/wzrilg47b/228b8c67/

This is my new error i get when logging in: http://postimg.org/image/wwk41ouq7/9a3e974e/

Read full topic

item.title: PK anywhere
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

There should only be 1 method that’s inWild() and returns a boolean…
If there were others it would throw errors… Some stuff might USE the method, or have similar naming…

And what did you edit? because this boolean shouldn’t really affect anything, except if your player is in wild or not…

Read full topic

item.title: PK anywhere
item.dc:creator: @monkof999 monkof999
item.description:
@monkof999 wrote:

Hey man I really appreciate your help, it means a lot. I ran into a error unfortunately. there was several public boolean in wild, but I assumed you meant to edit the one with all the coordinates. I did as you said and both the source and client compiled without error but now when I log it gives the black screen “connection lost, attempting to reestablish”

Got any clue what the problem is?

Read full topic

item.title: PK anywhere
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

There’s probably a variable in your Player.java called

Remove whatever it says… and make it just return true…

public boolean inWild() { return true; }
And magic.

Read full topic

item.title: PK anywhere
item.dc:creator: @monkof999 monkof999
item.description:
@monkof999 wrote:

This is the source I am using
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=654231.0

What it is im trying to do is make it where you can pvp anywhere except banks like you see in some of the pking servers out there, except it would be in a normal economy based server.

Read full topic

item.title: PK anywhere
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

It helps if you provide us with information about your server along with what you’re trying to do. We cannot just guess what base source you have and everything.
Read the link in my signature for some more help…

Read full topic
